channel.title: Comments on: For Monica
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: I read Mars and Venus years ago... has several useful tools for understanding... however, there's probably others that I'd recommend over that one. But it's always a good thing to aspire to better communication:)
item.content:encoded: I read Mars and Venus years ago… has several useful tools for understanding… however, there’s probably others that I’d recommend over that one. But it’s always a good thing to aspire to better communication:)

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I got my hair cut in December, so it has been short for a while. Sorry.
item.content:encoded: I got my hair cut in December, so it has been short for a while. Sorry.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I totally left out the part about ordering stuff on Amazon. I ordered Mirrormask and Office Space DVDs. I also ordered Men are From Mars, Women are From Venus as well as Mars & Venus in the Bedroom.
item.content:encoded: I totally left out the part about ordering stuff on Amazon. I ordered Mirrormask and Office Space DVDs. I also ordered Men are From Mars, Women are From Venus as well as Mars & Venus in the Bedroom.

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
Thank you.
The minutae is comforting...
want pics of your hair...
Hope you feel better:)
item.content:encoded:
Thank you.

The minutae is comforting…

want pics of your hair…

Hope you feel better:)
